item.title: LinkedInはSponsored Editorial Contentをテストしており、WSJのようなパブリッシャーがプラットフォーム上のオーガニック動画コンテンツにプレロール広告を挿入できるようにしている（Jack Marshall/TOOLKITS）
item.description:
Jack Marshall / TOOLKITS:
LinkedIn is testing Sponsored Editorial Content, letting publishers like the WSJ stitch pre-roll ads into their organic video content on the platform  —  LinkedIn is testing a new program enabling publishers to stitch pre-roll ads from partners directly into the organic video content they post to the platform.

item.title: カリフォルニア州上院議員、ビッグテック企業にデータマイニング料金を課し、税額控除を通じて地元のジャーナリズム雇用に年間5億ドルの資金を提供する法案を発表（マット・ピアース）

Steve Glazer is unveiling a bill to impose a data-mining fee on Big Tech to fund $500 million in local journalism jobs a year.

item.title: 米国成人の世論調査：53％が2024年の選挙中に偽情報を報道する報道機関を非常に懸念、42％がAIによる記事作成を懸念（David Bauder/Associated Press）
item.description:
David Bauder / Associated Press:
Poll of US adults: 53% are very concerned about news outlets reporting disinformation during the 2024 election; 42% worry about use of AI to create stories  —  Even as many Americans say they learn about the 2024 election campaign from national news outlets, a disquieting poll reveals some serious trust issues.

item.description:

item.title: ソニー、Crunchyrollの「メガファン」層を2ドル増の11.99ドル／月、「アルティメットファン」層を1ドル増の15.99ドル／月に引き上げ、「ファン」層は7.99ドル／月に据え置き（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Sony hikes Crunchyroll's Mega Fan tier by $2 to $11.99/month and the Ultimate Fan tier by $1 to $15.99/month; Fan tier will remain unchanged at $7.99/month  —  The pricing is increasing for Crunchyroll's Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan subscription tiers in select countries.

item.title: Substackは現在、作家がChatのディスカッション・スペースを有料化できるようにしており、積極的なChat参加者は購読を継続する可能性が12％高いとしている（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Substack now lets writers paywall their Chat discussion spaces and says active Chat participants are 12% more likely to retain their subscriptions  —  Substack is launching the ability for writers to paywall their entire Chat or specific threads to paid or founding members only, the company announced on Wednesday.

item.description:

Roblox expands its immersive video ad format to all advertisers and adds more controls, such as genre targeting and brand suitability, to its Ads Manager  —  The Roblox Corporation announced today that its video ads are opening up for all advertisers who wish to join.
